modName: TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim- Male and CHSBHC female
summary:
TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim- Male and CHSBHC female
this is aproject to covert all female TERA Armors by asianboy345 to CHSBHC.
descriptionHtml:
TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim- Male and CHSBHC female
Author(s): CherryHotaling and asianboy345

[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/9jpoxs.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/f9nwk.jpg[/IMG]

=======Description============================
This is a conversion of asianboy345  all female TERA Armors converted to fit CHSBHC body. The armor can be crafted at a forge, and can be improved and enchanted. only have 30 armors now.
==============================================
Install
======
1st download TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female by asianboy345 
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846/?)
Unpack the contents to your Skyrim data folder. overwrite existing file.

Known Issues
============
- small clipping issues with the boots & glove in some cases 
and when crouching.
- some armour dos't support weight slider.

Recommended:
========================
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics 
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB 
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation

Credits and thanks: 
- TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim byasianboy345
- CHSBHC body mod and BBP by CherryHotaling 

Credits and permissions:
TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim byasianboy345
author: golgappa
